sentenceId: We will disclose your personal information to third parties in the event that we consider selling any business or assets, in which case we will disclose your personal information to any prospective buyers of such business or assets;
appId: Honda | My Honda+ app | Privacy Policy | Car apps | Download Car apps

sentenceId: We will disclose your personal information to third parties if we, or substantially all of our assets, are acquired by a third party, in which case personal information held by us about our customers will be one of the transferred assets;
appId: Honda | My Honda+ app | Privacy Policy | Car apps | Download Car apps

sentenceId: We will disclose your personal information to third parties in the event we are the subject of any insolvency situation (e.g. the administration or liquidation);
appId: Honda | My Honda+ app | Privacy Policy | Car apps | Download Car apps

sentenceId: We will disclose your personal information to third parties in order to enforce or apply our terms and conditions, policies or any contract we have with you or have facilitated between you and a third party;
appId: Honda | My Honda+ app | Privacy Policy | Car apps | Download Car apps

sentenceId: We will disclose your personal information to third parties to protect our rights, property, or safety, or that of our people, or others.
appId: Honda | My Honda+ app | Privacy Policy | Car apps | Download Car apps

sentenceId: We will disclose your personal information to third parties if we are under a duty to disclose or share your personal information in order to comply with any legal obligation or regulatory requirements, or otherwise for the prevention or detection of fraud or crime.
appId: Honda | My Honda+ app | Privacy Policy | Car apps | Download Car apps
